Project.title: The Bait
Project.description: A robot programmed to clean comes across his greatest challenge in the form of acoffee stain. To what lengths will he go to complete his task? Winner of the Sci-on film festival’s director’s choice award.

Project.title: Retfӕrdig
Project.description: Look good, feel good, do good. Retfӕrdig’s new running shoes are made from recycled and sustainable materials, so whether you’re crushing it on the track or popping to the shops. Be confident that you’re doing it with the Earth.

Project.title: Draw
Project.description: Two kings battle for mastery of the chessboard.

Project.title: Joe
Project.description: A robot programmed to clean comes across his greatest challenge in the form of acoffee stain. To what lengths will he go to complete his task? Winner of the Sci-on film festival’s director’s choice award.
